summary: This bill grants permanent resident status to Luisa Mariana Sifuentes Arbirio. It allows her to apply for an immigrant visa or adjust her status to lawful permanent residence, waiving certain grounds for removal or denial of admission.  The bill also mandates the rescission of any outstanding removal orders against her. The application must be filed within two years of the bill's enactment.  Upon approval, the bill stipulates a reduction in the available immigrant visa numbers for her country of birth. Finally, it prevents her relatives from receiving preferential immigration treatment based on their relationship.
